strapiPost.title: Bitter Sweet Ending to Bentonville's Fred's Hickory Inn
strapiPost.content:
Having been around, serving the local Bentonville community for 52 years, the family-owned Fred's Hickory Inn is closing down. However, well-known, local restaurateurs will be taking over and manning the grill.

  • Good ol' days: Founded by Fred and Miss Lou in 1970, Fred's Hickory Inn has served Bentonville and the surrounding community for decades. It was well-known for its Ozark southern cooking style. Its last day in operation was Aug 8.
  • New ownership: The owners of Table Mesa, Table at the Station, Tavola Trattoria and Mirabellaâ€™s Table plan to open up a new restaurant called Table at the Hickory Inn - paying respect to the previous owner and history. The restaurant will temporarily remain closed throughout the transition.

Read more about the history and new ownership HERE.
